original_text: Just as he finished making the offering, Samuel arrived, and Saul went out to greet him.
korean_text: 번제 드리기를 마치자 사무엘이 온지라 사울이 나가 맞으며 문안하매

sentences.original_text: Just as he finished making the offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 제물을 드리기를 막 마쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: and Saul went out to greet him
